item.description:
Join the CT Sports Social Club for GOLF 101 lessons on Monday from 5:30 to 7:30pm, and at an Afterparty following the lesson

Discount Golf Lessons Connecticut ( www.DiscountGolfCT.com ) is starting its 9th year of offering low cost hands-on Golf Lessons for less than $17 per hour – which  includes use of Golf Clubs for people who want to try Golf before buying a set of expensive clubs and equipment.

Golf 101 teaches putting, chipping, swinging at the driving range, video swing analysis, and golf rules and etiquette.

GOLF 101 and GOLF 102 has graduated over 1,000 students, and is taught by Certified Golf Teaching Professional® George Claffey- who has been voted one of the top 100 Golf Teacher Worldwide by The United States Golf Teachers Federation (USGTF) in 2010 and 2012. Golf is a fun social sport that gets you outside in the nice weather, provides many challenges and exercise, and is a great way to meet new people and business contacts. Classes are kept small to offer personal attention,
and student choose their own schedule from Sunday afternoons 3:30 to 5:30pm
and Monday evenings 5:30 to 7:30pm.

Lessons are held at Miner Hills Golf Course, 85 Miner Road, Middletown – exit 20 off of 91 (Country Club Road). GOLF 102 is offered starting in May, and takes you out on the course for Scramble Tournament Playing Lessons against other GOLF 102 students for a great blend of golfing instruction and friendly competition. Lessons are $40 for a 2-hour lesson (including clubs and fees), or $100 for 3 lessons for a total of 6 hours. You can choose your dates to create a customized schedule. In case of bad weather, we will call you to reschedule your lesson.

To reserve you spot, buy your ticket on Meetup.com for $40.
Tickets at the lesson is $50 if any spots remain
- please call (860) 436-9449 to check if space is available.

To get the 3 lesson package for $100,
visit http://www.DiscountGolfCT.com or call (860) 436-9449

GOLF 101 Lessons start on Sunday April 28 and Monday April 29, and run until September.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet us at the clubhouse at 5:25pm

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: Golf 101 for New Golfers with the CT Sports Social Club - join us on the course
